languages.text: "Сколь чудовищен кощунственный износ, сколь высокий потенциал был утрачен. Фиксирую сигнал наивысшей скорби и обновляю ежедневные протоколы, занося в них рапсодильное моление на судьбу мира Ефрат-II".

"Such monstrous sacrilegious degradation, such significant potential lost. I am registering a signal of supreme sorrow. I am updating the daily protocols with a rhapsodic prayer for the fate of Eufrates II."
languages.original_text: "Сколь чудовищен кощунственный износ, сколь высокий потенциал был утрачен. Фиксирую сигнал наивысшей скорби и обновляю ежедневные протоколы, занося в них рапсодильное моление на судьбу мира Ефрат-II".

traits.locale_text: "Such monstrous sacrilegious degradation, such significant potential lost. I am registering a signal of supreme sorrow. I am updating the daily protocols with a rhapsodic prayer for the fate of Eufrates II."

"Such monstrous sacrilegious degradation, such significant potential lost. I am registering a signal of supreme sorrow. I am updating the daily protocols with a rhapsodic prayer for the fate of Eufrates II."

"Such monstrous sacrilegious degradation, such significant potential lost. I am registering a signal of supreme sorrow. I am updating the daily protocols with a rhapsodic prayer for the fate of Eufrates II."

"Such monstrous sacrilegious degradation, such significant potential lost. I am registering a signal of supreme sorrow. I am updating the daily protocols with a rhapsodic prayer for the fate of Eufrates II."

languages.text: “如此可怕的亵渎堕落，如此巨大的潜在损失，我对此感到极度悲伤。我正在更新每日仪式内容，新增对欧夫拉茨二号星所遭受命运的虔诚祷告。”
languages.original_text: "Such monstrous sacrilegious degradation, such significant potential lost. I am registering a signal of supreme sorrow. I am updating the daily protocols with a rhapsodic prayer for the fate of Eufrates II."

traits.locale_text: “如此可怕的亵渎堕落，如此巨大的潜在损失，我对此感到极度悲伤。我正在更新每日仪式内容，新增对欧夫拉茨二号星所遭受命运的虔诚祷告。”

languages.text: « Quelle dégradation sacrilège, quelle perte potentielle monumentale ! Je détecte un signal de tristesse extrême. Mise à jour des protocoles quotidiens : ajout d'une prière rhapsodique consacrée au destin d'Euphrate-II. »
languages.original_text: "Such monstrous sacrilegious degradation, such significant potential lost. I am registering a signal of supreme sorrow. I am updating the daily protocols with a rhapsodic prayer for the fate of Eufrates II."

traits.locale_text: « Quelle dégradation sacrilège, quelle perte potentielle monumentale ! Je détecte un signal de tristesse extrême. Mise à jour des protocoles quotidiens : ajout d'une prière rhapsodique consacrée au destin d'Euphrate-II. »

languages.text: «Una degradación sacrílega y abominable acompañada de una pérdida tremenda de potencial. Registro una señal de pesar absoluto. Actualizando protocolos diarios para añadir una plegaria rapsódica por el destino de Eufrates II».
languages.original_text: "Such monstrous sacrilegious degradation, such significant potential lost. I am registering a signal of supreme sorrow. I am updating the daily protocols with a rhapsodic prayer for the fate of Eufrates II."

traits.locale_text: «Una degradación sacrílega y abominable acompañada de una pérdida tremenda de potencial. Registro una señal de pesar absoluto. Actualizando protocolos diarios para añadir una plegaria rapsódica por el destino de Eufrates II».

languages.text: 「何と罰当たりで恐ろしい劣化、何と大きな可能性の損失か。極大の悲哀信号を記録。デイリープロトコルを更新し、ユーフラテス・IIの運命に熱狂的な祈りを捧ぐ」
languages.original_text: "Such monstrous sacrilegious degradation, such significant potential lost. I am registering a signal of supreme sorrow. I am updating the daily protocols with a rhapsodic prayer for the fate of Eufrates II."

traits.locale_text: 「何と罰当たりで恐ろしい劣化、何と大きな可能性の損失か。極大の悲哀信号を記録。デイリープロトコルを更新し、ユーフラテス・IIの運命に熱狂的な祈りを捧ぐ」

languages.text: "Solch ungeheuerlicher, frevlerischer Verfall, solch ein gewaltiger Verlust an Potenzial. Ich registriere ein Signal fürchterlicher Trauer. Ich aktualisiere die täglichen Protokolle und ergänze ein rhapsodisches Gebet für das Schicksal von Eufrates II."
languages.original_text: "Such monstrous sacrilegious degradation, such significant potential lost. I am registering a signal of supreme sorrow. I am updating the daily protocols with a rhapsodic prayer for the fate of Eufrates II."

traits.locale_text: "Solch ungeheuerlicher, frevlerischer Verfall, solch ein gewaltiger Verlust an Potenzial. Ich registriere ein Signal fürchterlicher Trauer. Ich aktualisiere die täglichen Protokolle und ergänze ein rhapsodisches Gebet für das Schicksal von Eufrates II."

languages.original_text: "Such monstrous sacrilegious degradation, such significant potential lost. I am registering a signal of supreme sorrow. I am updating the daily protocols with a rhapsodic prayer for the fate of Eufrates II."

languages.text: "Ne kadar büyük bir günahkârlık, ne önemli bir potansiyelin kaybı... Yüksek derecede keder sinyalleri algıladığımı kaydediyorum. Günlük protokolleri Eufrates II'nin kaderine yakarılan coşkun dualarla güncelliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Such monstrous sacrilegious degradation, such significant potential lost. I am registering a signal of supreme sorrow. I am updating the daily protocols with a rhapsodic prayer for the fate of Eufrates II."

traits.locale_text: "Ne kadar büyük bir günahkârlık, ne önemli bir potansiyelin kaybı... Yüksek derecede keder sinyalleri algılıyorum. Günlük protokolleri Eufrates II'nin kaderi için neşeli dualarla güncelliyorum."
